summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganThe Performer Skin-Focused Foundation by about-face: buildable, breathable, medium coverage delivers a longwear, second-skin finish.
details: DetailsFeaturesCoverage meets skincare in this skin-optimizing foundation formulated with powerful ingredients like blue agave, wintergreen + chlorella, known to help skin feel moisturized, balanced and smooth.Key IngredientsBlue AgaveWintergreen + ChlorellaKey NotesVegan and cleanly formulated.Item 2618950IngredientsAqua (Water/Eau), Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Glycerin, Dicaprylyl Ether, Butylene Glycol, Isododecane, Hydrogenated Polycyclopentadiene, Polyglyceryl-4 Isostearate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Polyglyceryl-2 Dipolyhydroxystearate, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Magnesium Sulfate, Pentylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Mica, Silica, Sorbitan Isostearate, Gaultheria Procumbens (Wintergreen/Thé des bois) Leaf Extract, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Propylene Carbonate, Sodium Hydroxide, Tocopheryl Acetate, Chlorella Sorokiniana Extract, Ethylhexylglycerin, Ethylene/Propylene/Styrene Copolymer, Butylene/Ethylene/Styrene Copolymer, Yeast Extract, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Carbonate, Tocopherol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate. [+/- (May contain / Peut contenir): CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), CI 77491 (Iron Oxides), CI 77492 (Iron Oxides), CI 77499 (Iron Oxides)].
ingredients: Gaultheria Procumbens (Wintergreen/Thé des bois) Leaf Extract
Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate. [+/- (May contain / Peut contenir):

reviews.headline: My new holy grail
reviews.comments: I LOVE this foundation. Being a black girl with olive undertones is rough. Foundation always has a grey, orange, or red overcast. Halsey and About Face you DID IT! After 27 years I've found my perfect shade match. Thank you a million times over

reviews.headline: Quality product
reviews.comments: I put it on and for the first time I had a perfect shade match! That alone is worth it to me. It lasts longer than I have found.

reviews.headline: Skin Tint
reviews.comments: Super lame coverage. Probably my fault for not examining the label clearly enough, but I assumed from past experiences that "foundation" meant at least medium coverage. Disappointing for the price, but I guess someone with better skin will like it.

reviews.headline: Would repurchase
reviews.comments: Beautiful foundation. Coverage builds well while remaining light weight. I didn't give it 5 stars because the neutral undertone pulls slightly yellow on me, which I typically don't experience with neutral undertown foundations.

reviews.headline: Dry and oily
reviews.comments: This foundation is terrible. It's so hyped up. I love the shade. I'm a fair olive. It has zero coverage. The packaging is terrible. It made me itchy, and I got horrible cystic acne. I never break out. It is dry and an oil slick at the same time.ashy

reviews.headline: Fair Olive
reviews.comments: I've never found a more perfect match for my foundation shade. I mix it a touch with IT CC for some more coverage and its the prettiest my foundation has ever looked.

reviews.headline: Color range is wild and it's dry
reviews.comments: The shade range is wild.  I picked L1 neutral and it's very dark and yellow.  There's no skin like finish.  This is matte and I wish that was stated in the description. The packaging is deceptive because the glass distorts the color.  Looks very neutral in the bottle, but very yellow on my hand.  If you have dry skin, skip!!

reviews.headline: Absolute favorite
reviews.comments: I have tried just about every foundation, this is the only one i have loved and repurchased. It is the perfect shade match, and one of the few that dont turn orange on me. It doesnt pill, and is so smooth, it truly is your skin but better.

reviews.headline: I don't get the hype?
reviews.comments: I don't understand the hype perhaps they're payong influencers good money to build this up so much. I tried it and it just felt so oily and zero coverage. The packaging is a little annoying why not add a pump? If you gave perfect skin i think this would look good and if you have very dry skin otherwise stayaway save your money.

reviews.headline: Wow
reviews.comments: I normally don't write reviews, but this foundation has blown me away. I'm a pale, olive skinned girly, and it has literally been impossible for me to find anything that matches my skin. This is the first foundation that I've worn that matches my skin and my undertone perfectly. It's really easy to work with and last all day. Light to medium coverage, but definitely buildable with a really nice skin like finish. I am so happy with it. If I could change one thing, I just wish that they would change the packaging to a pump instead of a dough foot applicator.

reviews.headline: Underrated
reviews.comments: So skin like and thin. Feels light on the skin buildable coverage.

reviews.headline: Love the color match, hate the packaging
reviews.comments: Needed something lightweight as my orher foundation seemed to get patchy and dry. I love the color match, but I hate the applicator and the thought of putting it on my skin then back in the bottle.

reviews.headline: Halsey did her big one
reviews.comments: I love this foundation! I love how she offered olive tones because I lean more yellow, and most warm tones foundations lean more orange!! I've been wearing this more than my Haus Labs which is hard to believe!!

reviews.headline: Love the shade range!
reviews.comments: I have an olive skin tone and find it hard to match foundation to my undertone! This foundation is a perfect color match and doesnt feel too heavy!

reviews.headline: great for light olive folks
reviews.comments: the only foundation i've found that matches my light olive skin and doesn't make me look orange or pink!

reviews.headline: Does what it claims!
reviews.comments: This is legit. Very lightweight, buildable coverage that LASTS in humid, rainy, Florida weather WITHOUT powder (just setting spray). (For reference: I have combo skin and use One/Size's Secure the Wweat primer.) This foundation feels like I have nothing on but looks skin-like with a beautiful soft matte finish. (A little goes a long way!) Very comparable to the Lumi Matte foundation (which I also love), but this one does a better job at keeping natural oils at bay IMO. (Lumi Matte ends up a little too glowy on me after a few hours, so I need to keep blotting papers on hand.) Because there are so many undertones in this line, it's best to swatch in store. The only con is the packaging. I wish it were a pump bottle. The doe foot is quite large and awkwardly shaped, so it's a pain getting it in and out of the bottle.  Would also love if the brand launched mini versions of a few shades for travel!

reviews.headline: Slightly below average
reviews.comments: Really, more like 2.5 stars. It's a thin, watery foundation and the coverage is minimal. The color match is slightly off for me, F2 cool. The next color up would probably be too dark. Summer sunshine, I guess. It's been 4 hours since I applied this to my combo skin and it's already shiny and gross looking. I will say, it does feel lightweight.

reviews.headline: Great foundation
reviews.comments: Lasts all day and has a great range of shades. Actually exceeded my expectation and the price isn't bad either.

reviews.headline: Something isn't right about this!
reviews.comments: As a normal to oily skin type, this just didnt work for me. I was excited to find an olive tone foundation to try but I wore this to the office one day and any time I caught a glimpse of myself in the mirror I couldnt help but think this looked OFF— I looked tired and skin looked like it was dehydrated AND oily.  It looked almost greasy and dry at the same time and left my face looking like i had texture that I dont actually have.  Super strange! It also oxidized and had a washed out appearance on my skin but didnt cover very well at the same time.  The applicator also seemed to really want to work against me and applied such little amounts of foundation, I could barely build it up. I'm going to see if I can return soon and just get my my usuals. I don't recommend this unfortunately.

reviews.headline: GO TO FOUNDATION
reviews.comments: Bought DEC of 2024 and still using the same bottle, so the amount you get is great. I love this foundation. It covers my blemishes and falls on my face and pores so well. It just looks glowy and beautiful

media.headline: Fair Olive F2 for the win!
media.caption: The Performer F2 Fair olive

faceoff_positive.comments:
As someone personally, who does love a more natural make up look for day-to-day, I find that this foundation doesn't absolutely perfect. You can build it up to a more medium coverage however I do a more sheared to light coverage due to the fact that it does cover pretty well. I do feel like you do need a powder in some places. You definitely do need a primer if you are going to be wearing this out for a long period of time. This does have a radiant finish or dewy finish, i personally enjoy that. This is dry, skin friendly, I do recommend exfoliating, though just beforehand just in case. I love that you can mix other products and that it is compatible with other products that I do use on my face. but I really need to apply the shade range because it really does adhere to everyone with all different undertones. I had been in the biggest ruckus about finding a foundation that matched me perfectly. And the fact that I was able to find one after multiple brands were not able to find my exact shade, it really made me happy and I was very satisfied. I enjoy that they also had warm, but also they had an olive undertone which I feel like is always mixed into warm, and I don't like that. However, with this brand they did not do that and they really made sure that people with all of undertones were seen.
My only complaint is that I do wish this was a pump instead of a double foot applicator. I just personally enjoy the pump because it's just is something of a preference for me however, it does not bother me that bad where it would discourage me from purchasing the product again. Overall, I would definitely recommend this to my friends and I do recommend this to my friends. I feel like this is a foundation that is slept on. It almost irritates me overall I love the foundation. I will definitely be purchasing this again.
faceoff_positive.headline: As someone who loved a natural makeup look..

faceoff_negative.comments: The shade range is decent i think there are a few shades in between medium dark and dark that can be added. I had to go to ulta a few times because the shades I picked out either ran too yellow too red or just flat out was orange after letting it oxidize. I think this shade range is a start but truly alot of the colors were too orange and just yellowish. The only pros are the ones that people already mentioned before its a nice satin finish lightweight buildable yes that is true. I didnt feel like i had loads of makeup on my face when i applied it 3 times it felt like a moisturizer with a nice glow. The cons I just think the smell was a bit interesting like it wasnt a horrible smell but its not like a pleasant one either idk you might have to just buy it to understand and see for yourself. The applicator was tough to get out i thought i would get foundation everywhrre with the way I was struggling to pull put the wand from the bottle. I think the wand is very cool but maybe the issue with the packging is just the firmness the bottle has to the wand.
faceoff_negative.headline: Pros & Cons from a Perosn of color POV
